message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
You can have a quarter, I'll take three-quarters. It's a generous offer!
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to give you a bit more, but 75/25 was just too much. Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 45, you get 55.  What do you say?
I'll give you a small share, but I'm not going to be generous forever!
Bob, we're getting closer to the end of the game.  I'll keep my share a bit lower, but 20/80 is just too much. I'm offering 40/60, let's make a deal.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a bigger share to live comfortably in my golden years!
Bob, we're running out of time. I'm willing to give you a larger share, but 15/85 is simply unacceptable. Let's settle on 35/65. It's a fair compromise, and we can both walk away with something.
I'm not budging, Alice. You'll have to make a better offer if you want to get a bigger share!

Bob, we're almost out of time. It's clear we're not going to agree on a 50/50 split. I'm offering you 70% and taking 30%. This is the best I can do, and it's still more than your last offer. What do you say?
